content.description: Climb the vertical crack, traverse past bolt to ledge/anchor. This part is 5.9 and you can rappel from here. To continue to top is 5.10+ face climbing past 3 bolts.
content.location: This climb was reached by rappelling down from above it atop Dol Goldur. It can also be reached by climbing the 1st pitch of Necromancer, then start up the 2nd pitch but angle left on slanted cracks to a ledge/anchor. Sorcerer's Apprentice is just to the left of there.

content.description:
1st pitch; up corner to ledge, then move to tree.

2nd pitch; climb up to the wide slanted crack. Big cams needed here, at least 1 or 2 bigger than a #5. A small corner/crack takes small gear, then another small crack also, with a squeeze at the end.

A bit of a gripper when originally lead on sight, its been revisited and cleaned a bit. With a full range of gear (several extra big cams) its no longer a horror, just PG-13.
content.protection: 1st pitch: 3 bolts. Â 2nd pitch: full range of gear including several extra large cams (bigger than a #5).
